Name: Migrate case
Comment: Event is triggered by running migration tool - callback modifies the data.

Name: Allocated Judge
Description: Add allocated judge to a case

Name: Removal Tool
Description: Remove tool for removing an order, document or application from the case

Name: Review additional application
Description: Judges to review uploaded additional application

Name: Children
Description: Amending the children for the case

Name: Hearing urgency
Description: Selecting the hearing needed for application

Name: Child's details
Description: Entering the children for the case

Name: Respondents' details
Description: Entering the respondents for the case

Name: Grounds for the application
Description: Entering the grounds for the application

Name: Risk and harm to children
Description: Entering opinion on risk and harm to children
EventEnablingCondition: otherOrderType!="YES" AND secureAccommodationOrderType!="YES" AND refuseContactWithChildOrderType!="YES" AND contactWithChildInCareOrderType!="YES"

Name: Factors affecting parenting
EventEnablingCondition: otherOrderType!="YES" AND secureAccommodationOrderType!="YES" AND refuseContactWithChildOrderType!="YES" AND contactWithChildInCareOrderType!="YES"

Name: Allocation proposal
Description: Entering other proceedings and allocation proposals

Name: Court services needed
Description: Enter extra support needed for anyone to take part in hearing

Name: Attending the hearing
Description: Amend extra support needed for anyone to take part in hearing

Name: Respondents
Description: Amending the respondents for the case
Comment: Can be removed when respondent journey toggled on (replace with enterRespondents)

Name: Other proceedings
Description: Amending other proceedings and allocation proposals

Name: Change case state
Description: Change the state of the case

Name: Manage hearings
Description: Manage hearing booking details on a case

Name: Approve orders
Description: Review draft case management orders and C21 orders uploaded by the local authority

Name: Case progression report
Description: Cases at risk and Cases not meeting timetable

Name: Send order reminder
Description: Lets the CTSC send a reminder to the LA to upload an order.

Name: Create work allocation task
Description: Creates a task for work allocation
